summary: Fixed compose and email preview keybindings not appearing in which-key menu by replacing cond-based registration with buffer-local registration. Updated email_composer.lua and email_preview.lua to register keymaps per-buffer using wk.add() with buffer = buf. Removed deprecated cond-based mappings and unused helper functions from which-key.lua.

artifacts.summary: Added buffer-local which-key registration for compose keymaps
Added buffer-local which-key registration for preview keymaps
Removed deprecated cond-based mappings and unused helper functions

completion_data.completion_summary: Fixed which-key conditional mappings by replacing cond-based registration with buffer-local registration. Compose keymaps (<leader>me, <leader>md, <leader>mq) now appear when composing emails, and preview keymaps appear in himalaya-email buffers.

next_steps: Test changes by opening Neovim, composing an email with :HimalayaWrite, and pressing <leader>m to verify compose keymaps appear
